ygData.subject: Re: Leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I didn t know they still sold 10 slot items through vendors since they took out the 10 slot sewing kits. I only have like two or three of those.
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I didn't know they still sold 10 slot
items through vendors since they took out the 10 slot
sewing kits. I only have like two or three of those.
=/<br><br>Got a friend who had filled his whole bank and
inventory with those things so he has like 17 or 18 of
those things.<br><br>But I'll fill my bank with those
Thurg toolboxes and carry tailored on myself.
Grin.<br><br>Oh... and btw. Here's an interesting lesser known piece
of info about Harmony. Many druids still scoff at me
for this but...<br><br>Harmony yourself at lower
levels. Then sit and watch your mana bar. It will fill up
slightly faster than normal. It's by no means a Clarity or
even a Breeze... but when you're a poor Druid watching
your tank dying-- wishing you could get off just one
more heal cause then ya'll could get him about 1 bub
of health and taunt off the mobs...<br><br>Yeah.
That's when I loved harmony the most at say level 5 to
20 (although by 20 it was almost pointless) and
especially at Aviak city. I learned about the mana thing
about two years ago on a post on Everlore or something
like that. Got me curious and I tested it. Lo and
behold... I thought I noticed a difference. I could be
crazy but I still firmly believe I saw a difference. I
haven't tried it in so long though. =)<br><br>shooman out
